languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Relocate can be cast a second time in turn, if the Overseer has Iconoclast-2

traits.locale_text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Relocate can be cast a second time in turn, if the Overseer has Iconoclast-2

languages.text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, they can use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} twice per turn.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Если после применения {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Передислокации{/g} на соседних с псайбервороном клетках находится 2 или более существ, при расчете эффекта ретранслируемых {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} считается увеличенным на 1 до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Ruhsiber kuzgun, üzerinde {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Taşınma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanıldıktan sonra 2 veya daha fazla yaratığın bitişiğindeyse bu ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla aktarılan {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erene dek {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi dereceleri{/g} +1 artmış gibi hesaplanır.
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Taşınma{/g} kabiliyetini bir turda iki kez kullanabilir.

If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Ruhsiber kuzgun, üzerinde {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Taşınma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanıldıktan sonra 2 veya daha fazla yaratığın bitişiğindeyse bu ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla aktarılan {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erene dek {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi dereceleri{/g} +1 artmış gibi hesaplanır.
Gözetmen, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Taraftar kanaatine sahipse {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Taşınma{/g} kabiliyetini bir turda iki kez kullanabilir.

Ruhsiber kuzgun +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Ruhsiber kuzgun, üzerinde {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Taşınma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanıldıktan sonra 2 veya daha fazla yaratığın bitişiğindeyse bu ruhsiber kuzgun aracılığıyla aktarılan {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erene dek {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi dereceleri{/g} +1 artmış gibi hesaplanır.

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Si el psicocuervo está adyacente a 2 criaturas o más después de que se use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Reubicar{/g} sobre él, los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} transmitidos a través de este psicocuervo se calculan como si el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} aumentase en +1 hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}.
Si el supervisor tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Partidario, puede usar {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Reubicar{/g} dos veces por turno.

The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

El psicocuervo recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Si el psicocuervo está adyacente a 2 criaturas o más después de que se use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Reubicar{/g} sobre él, los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} transmitidos a través de este psicocuervo se calculan como si el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} aumentase en +1 hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}.

languages.text:
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高10点。
如果生化渡鸦使用{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}迁移{/g}能力后与至少2个生物相邻，则通过此生化渡鸦中继的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}在计算效果时，视为{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级。此效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。
如果监察官拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——拥护者，则{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}迁移{/g}能力每回合可使用两次。

如果监察官拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——拥护者，则{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}迁移{/g}能力每回合可使用两次。

生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高10点。
如果生化渡鸦使用{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}迁移{/g}能力后与至少2个生物相邻，则通过此生化渡鸦中继的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}在计算效果时，视为{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级。此效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Befindet sich der Psitech-Rabe nach dem Einsatz von {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relokation{/g} neben 2 oder mehr Kreaturen, werden durch diesen Psitech-Raben umgeleitete {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} berechnet, als wäre der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} um +1 erhöht worden.
Hat der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Anhänger, kann er {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relokation{/g} zweimal pro Zug einsetzen.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, they can use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} twice per turn.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Befindet sich der Psitech-Rabe nach dem Einsatz von {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relokation{/g} neben 2 oder mehr Kreaturen, werden durch diesen Psitech-Raben umgeleitete {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} berechnet, als wäre der {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} um +1 erhöht worden.
Hat der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Anhänger, kann er {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relokation{/g} zweimal pro Zug einsetzen.

Der Psitech-Rabe erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Wenn der Psitech-Rabe nach {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Ortswechsel{/g} an 2 oder mehr Kreaturen angrenzt, werden durch diesen Psitech-Raben übertragene {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} berechnet, als wäre sein {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} um +1 höher.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +10.
Si la psyber-corneille est adjacente à au moins 2 créatures après {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocalisation{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qu'elle relaie sont calculés comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était augmenté de +1 jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.
Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Partisan, il peut utiliser {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocalisation{/g} 2 fois par tour.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, they can use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} twice per turn.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +10.
Si la psyber-corneille est adjacente à au moins 2 créatures après {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocalisation{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qu'elle relaie sont calculés comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était augmenté de +1 jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.
Si le surveillant possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Partisan, il peut utiliser {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocalisation{/g} 2 fois par tour.

La psyber-corneille reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de +10.
Si la psyber-corneille est adjacente à au moins 2 créatures après une {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}relocalisation{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} qu'elle relaie sont calculés comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était augmenté de +1 jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}は+10される。
{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を使用した後、サイバーレイヴンが2体以上の生物に隣接している場合、そのサイバーレイヴンを通じて中継される{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+1増加したものとして計算される。
監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} — 門下生の場合、{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を1ターンにつき2回使用できる。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, they can use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} twice per turn.

{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を使用した後、サイバーレイヴンが2体以上の生物に隣接している場合、そのサイバーレイヴンを通じて中継される{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+1増加したものとして計算される。
監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} — 門下生の場合、{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を1ターンにつき2回使用できる。

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+10される。
{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を使用した後、サイバーレイヴンが2体以上の生物に隣接している場合、そのサイバーレイヴンを通じて引き継がれる超能力は、監督者のターン終了まで超能力レートが+1増加したものとして計算される。

サイバーレイヴンの意志力は+10される。
{g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}再配置{/g}を使用した後、サイバーレイヴンが2体以上の生物に隣接している場合、そのサイバーレイヴンを通じて引き継がれる超能力は、監督者のターン終了まで超能力レートが+1増加したものとして計算される。

languages.text:
Псайберворон получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g}.
Если после применения {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Передислокации{/g} на соседних с псайбервороном клетках находится 2 или более существ, при расчете эффекта ретранслируемых {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} считается увеличенным на 1 до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}.
Если надзиратель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — сторонник, он может применять {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Передислокацию{/g} до двух раз за ход.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the psyber-raven is adjacent to 2 or more creatures after {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} is used on it, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} relayed through this psyber-raven are calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +1 until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Overseer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, they can use {g|f:5f6ef4bf13754f7285ac540bfd2ee80f}Relocate{/g} twice per turn.
